question: The famous tourist attraction "Titou Gorge" is located in which country?
explanation: Titou Gorge is located in the island country of Dominica, officially the Commonwealth of Dominica, in the Windward Islands of the Lesser Antilles Archipelago. Titou Gorge means "Little Throat" is formed by volcanic lava which cooled and split open leaving this natural cave. This gorge is located in the Morne Trois Pitons National Park. Titou Gorge is a deep pool warmed by a hot spring, i.e; a beautiful waterfall splashing into the gorge.
